name: Blue Oasis
description: Blue Oasis is a delicious gin cocktail that you can prepare for your guests in a kitty party o a game night! This drink goes well on a hot summer night to unwind with your friends.
directions: Take a cocktail shaker and fill it half with crushed ice.
Add gin along with blue curacao and soda, and shake well until frosted.
Take a chilled cocktail glass and strain the liquid mixture into it.
Garnish with a lemon wedge or slice, and serve immediately.
(Note: You can even put salt on the rim of the glass for an exciting flavour.
